recipe.title: Grilled Harissa Shrimp
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds large shrimp, peeled, tails intact, deveined
Ingredient info: Harissa paste, a spicy North African chile paste, is available at Middle Eastern markets and some specialty foods stores, and from online sources.
instructions: Prepare grill for medium-high heat. Combine shrimp, harissa, and oil in a medium bowl; season with salt and toss to coat. Grill shrimp until cooked through, about 2 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate and let cool. Toss shrimp, radishes, basil, and cilantro in another medium bowl; season with salt and pepper. DO AHEAD: Shrimp can be grilled 2 hours ahead. Cover and chill.
